about_the_game:
The complete Santa Girls 15 song Soundtrack including main Jpop style remixed theme song and original english version.

Once installed a folder will appear in the main directory with the mp3 files included within for you to enjoy on your computer.

Tracklist:
  • 0. The Gift (Jpop Remix)
  • 0b. The Gift Original English Version
  • 00. Main Menu Theme Instrumental
  • 1. Main Theme
  • 2. Geoff's Theme
  • 3. Elly's Theme
  • 4. Sally's Theme
  • 5. Raine's Theme
  • 6. Hayley's Theme
  • 7. Adult Scenes
  • 8. Romance in the Cold
  • 9. Christmassy Feel
  • 10. Bad Ending
  • 11. Merry Christmas!
  • 12. Christmas to Spring

Minimum:

  • Processor: 1.66 Ghz
